name: Bird Dash (BlockedNickel)
description:
You are a new project bird made by the CIA. The public has found out about your existence and now want to stop you. How far can you get before they do?

Controls:

 A + D to move left and right

Space Bar to jump (Hold for a bigger jump)

Right click to attack

Esc to Pause

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Assets:

Bird - https://foozlecc.itch.io/little-bird

Enemy - https://friday-art.itch.io/simple-2d-characters

Background: https://kayillustrations.itch.io/parallax-sunset-mountains

Font - https://tinyworlds.itch.io/free-pixel-font-thaleah

Music - https://jonathan-so.itch.io/creatorpack
